mapper.select: SELECT /*+INDEX(A INDEX_DATE A INDEX_ARCH A INDEX_AREA A INDEX_TOTAREA) */ MAIN_PURPS_NM ,TOTAREA ,YEAR ,MONTH ,ENERGY_TYPE ,TOE ,TCO2EQ ,SIGUNGU_NM ,BJDONG_NM FROM ENERGY_LEDGERS

SELECT ADMIN_CD AS "admin_cd" , ADMIN_CD_SD AS "admin_cd_sd" , ADMIN_CD_SGG AS "admin_cd_sgg" , ADMIN_CD_EMD AS "admin_cd_emd" , ADMIN_NM_SD AS "admin_nm_sd" , ADMIN_NM_SGG AS "admin_nm_sgg" , ADMIN_NM_EMD AS "admin_nm_emd" FROM ADMIN_CODE WHERE ADMIN_CD_SGG = #{admin_cd_sgg } ORDER BY ADMIN_NM_EMD

SELECT ADMIN_BJ_CD AS "admin_bj_cd" , ADMIN_HJ_CD AS "admin_hj_cd" , ADM_DR_CD AS "adm_dr_cd" , B.X AS "x" , B.Y AS "y" FROM ADMIN_HJ_CODE A, ADMIN_CODE B WHERE A.ADMIN_BJ_CD = B.ADMIN_CD AND A.ADMIN_BJ_CD = #{admin_cd_emd }

select.if: SELECT X AS "x" , Y AS "y" FROM ADMIN_CODE WHERE ADMIN_NM_EMD = #{admin_code }
SELECT X AS "x" , Y AS "y" FROM ADMIN_CODE_SGG WHERE ADMIN_CD_SGG = #{admin_code }

mapper.select: SELECT MGM_BLD_PK AS "mgm_bld_pk" , SIGUNGU_NM AS "sigungu_nm" , BJDONG_NM AS "bjdong_nm" , MAIN_PURPS_CD AS "main_purps_cd" , JUSO AS "juso" , TOTAREA AS "totarea_sum" , USEAPR_DAY AS "useapr_day" FROM ARCH_MAIN_LEDGER_RENEW WHERE SIGUNGU_NM = #{sigungu_nm } AND BJDONG_NM = #{bjdong_nm }

SELECT A.MGM_BLD_PK AS "mgm_bld_pk" , A.JUSO AS "juso" , A.TOTAREA AS "totarea" , A.MAIN_PURPS_NM AS "main_purps_nm" , ROUND((SYSDATE - TO_DATE(A.USEAPR_DAY, 'YYYYMMDD')) / 365) AS "useapr_day" , B.ENERGY_TYPE AS "energy_type" , ROUND(SUM(B.ENERGY_USE), 2) AS "energy_use" , ROUND(SUM(B.TCO2EQ), 2) AS "tco2eq" FROM ARCH_MAIN_LEDGER_RENEW A, ENERGY_LEDGER_RENEW B WHERE A.MGM_BLD_PK = B.MGM_BLD_PK AND A.MGM_BLD_PK = #{bd_pk_1 } AND B.YEAR || B.MONTH BETWEEN #{start_year } || #{start_month } AND #{end_year } || #{end_month }
AND B.ENERGY_TYPE IN ('전기', '가스', '지역난방')
AND B.ENERGY_TYPE IN ('가스', '지역난방')
AND B.ENERGY_TYPE IN ('전기', '지역난방')
AND B.ENERGY_TYPE IN ('전기', '가스')
AND B.ENERGY_TYPE = '지역난방'
AND B.ENERGY_TYPE = '가스'
AND B.ENERGY_TYPE = '전기'
GROUP BY A.MGM_BLD_PK, A.JUSO, A.TOTAREA, A.MAIN_PURPS_NM, A.USEAPR_DAY, B.ENERGY_TYPE

SELECT A.MGM_BLD_PK AS "mgm_bld_pk" , A.JUSO AS "juso" , A.TOTAREA AS "totarea" , A.MAIN_PURPS_NM AS "main_purps_nm" , ROUND((SYSDATE - TO_DATE(A.USEAPR_DAY, 'YYYYMMDD')) / 365) AS "useapr_day" FROM ARCH_MAIN_LEDGER_RENEW A WHERE A.MGM_BLD_PK = #{bd_pk_1 }
SELECT ENERGY_TYPE AS "energy_type" , ROUND(SUM(ENERGY_USE), 2) AS "energy_use" , ROUND(SUM(TCO2EQ) , 2) AS "tco2eq" FROM ENERGY_LEDGER_RENEW WHERE MGM_BLD_PK = #{bd_pk_1 } GROUP BY ENERGY_TYPE

SELECT CONS_NM AS "cons_nm" , DONG_NM AS "dong_nm" , MAIN_PURPS_NM AS "main_purps_nm" , ROUND((SYSDATE - TO_DATE(USEAPR_DAY, 'YYYYMMDD')) / 365) AS "useapr_day" , TOTAREA AS "totarea" FROM ARCH_ALL_LEDGER_RENEW WHERE JUSO = (SELECT JUSO FROM ARCH_MAIN_LEDGER_RENEW WHERE MGM_BLD_PK = #{bd_pk_1 })

SELECT B.ENERGY_TYPE AS "energy_type" , ROUND(SUM(B.ENERGY_USE), 2) AS "energy_use_sum" , ROUND(SUM(B.TCO2EQ), 2) AS "tco2eq_sum" FROM ARCH_MAIN_LEDGER_RENEW A, ENERGY_LEDGER_RENEW B WHERE A.MGM_BLD_PK = B.MGM_BLD_PK
AND B.ENERGY_TYPE IN ('전기', '가스', '지역난방')
AND B.ENERGY_TYPE IN ('가스', '지역난방')
AND B.ENERGY_TYPE IN ('전기', '지역난방')
AND B.ENERGY_TYPE IN ('전기', '가스')
AND B.ENERGY_TYPE = '지역난방'
AND B.ENERGY_TYPE = '가스'
AND B.ENERGY_TYPE = '전기'
AND A.SIGUNGU_NM = #{sigungu_nm }
AND A.BJDONG_NM = #{bjdong_nm }
AND B.YEAR || B.MONTH BETWEEN #{start_year } || #{start_month } AND #{end_year } || #{end_month } GROUP BY B.ENERGY_TYPE
SELECT DISTINCT(JUSO) AS "juso" FROM ARCH_MAIN_LEDGER_RENEW WHERE JUSO like '%'||#{juso}||'%'

SELECT A.JUSO AS "juso" , A.TOTAREA AS "totarea" , A.MGM_BLD_PK AS "mgm_bld_pk" , A.CONS_NM AS "cons_nm" , A.MAIN_PURPS_NM AS "main_purps_nm" , A.USEAPR_DAY AS "useapr_day"
, A.X AS "x" , A.Y AS "y" FROM ARCH_MAIN_LEDGER_RENEW A WHERE A.JUSO = #{search_juso}

SELECT A.JUSO AS "juso" , A.TOTAREA AS "totarea" , A.MGM_BLD_PK AS "mgm_bld_pk" , A.MAIN_PURPS_NM AS "main_purps_nm" , ROUND((SYSDATE - TO_DATE(A.USEAPR_DAY, 'YYYYMMDD')) / 365) AS "useapr_day" FROM ARCH_MAIN_LEDGER_RENEW A WHERE A.MGM_BLD_PK = #{mgm_bld_pk }

SELECT MGM_BLD_PK AS "mgm_bld_pk" , YEAR AS "year" , MONTH AS "month" , ENERGY_TYPE AS "energy_type" , ROUND(ENERGY_USE, 2) AS "energy_use" , ROUND(TCO2EQ, 2) AS "tco2eq" FROM ENERGY_LEDGER_RENEW WHERE MGM_BLD_PK = #{mgm_bld_pk} AND YEAR = #{year} ORDER BY MONTH ASC

SELECT A.JUSO AS "juso" , A.TOTAREA AS "totarea" , A.MAIN_PURPS_NM AS "main_purps_nm" , ROUND((SYSDATE - TO_DATE(A.USEAPR_DAY, 'YYYYMMDD')) / 365) AS "useapr_day" , B.ENERGY_TYPE AS "energy_type" , ROUND(SUM(B.ENERGY_USE), 2) AS "energy_use" , ROUND(SUM(B.TCO2EQ), 2) AS "tco2eq" FROM ARCH_MAIN_LEDGER_RENEW A, ENERGY_LEDGER_RENEW B WHERE A.MGM_BLD_PK = B.MGM_BLD_PK AND A.JUSO = #{search_juso} AND B.YEAR = #{start_year } AND B.ENERGY_TYPE IN ('전기', '가스', '지역난방') GROUP BY A.MGM_BLD_PK, A.JUSO, A.TOTAREA, A.MAIN_PURPS_NM, A.USEAPR_DAY, B.ENERGY_TYPE
